js_arr.name: concat()
js_arr.desc: Joins arrays and returns an array with the joined arrays

js_arr.name: constructor
js_arr.desc: Returns the function that created the Array object's prototype

js_arr.name: copyWithin()
js_arr.desc: Copies array elements within the array, to and from specified positions

js_arr.name: entries()
js_arr.desc: Returns a key/value pair Array Iteration Object

js_arr.name: every()
js_arr.desc: Checks if every element in an array pass a test

js_arr.name: fill()
js_arr.desc: Fill the elements in an array with a static value

js_arr.name: filter()
js_arr.desc: Creates a new array with every element in an array that pass a test

js_arr.name: find()
js_arr.desc: Returns the value of the first element in an array that pass a test

js_arr.name: findIndex()
js_arr.desc: Returns the index of the first element in an array that pass a test

js_arr.name: forEach()
js_arr.desc: Calls a function for each array element

js_arr.name: from()
js_arr.desc: Creates an array from an object

js_arr.name: includes()
js_arr.desc: Check if an array contains the specified element

js_arr.name: indexOf()
js_arr.desc: Search the array for an element and returns its position

js_arr.name: isArray()
js_arr.desc: Checks whether an object is an array

js_arr.name: join()
js_arr.desc: Joins all elements of an array into a string

js_arr.name: keys()
js_arr.desc: Returns a Array Iteration Object, containing the keys of the original array

js_arr.name: lastIndexOf()
js_arr.desc: Search the array for an element, starting at the end, and returns its position

js_arr.name: length
js_arr.desc: Sets or returns the number of elements in an array

js_arr.name: map()
js_arr.desc: Creates a new array with the result of calling a function for each array element

js_arr.name: pop()
js_arr.desc: Removes the last element of an array, and returns that element

js_arr.name: prototype
js_arr.desc: Allows you to add properties and methods to an Array object

js_arr.name: push()
js_arr.desc: Adds new elements to the end of an array, and returns the new length

js_arr.name: reduce()
js_arr.desc: Reduce the values of an array to a single value (going left-to-right)

js_arr.name: reduceRight()
js_arr.desc: Reduce the values of an array to a single value (going right-to-left)

js_arr.name: reverse()
js_arr.desc: Reverses the order of the elements in an array

js_arr.name: shift()
js_arr.desc: Removes the first element of an array, and returns that element

js_arr.name: slice()
js_arr.desc: Selects a part of an array, and returns the new array

js_arr.name: some()
js_arr.desc: Checks if any of the elements in an array pass a test

js_arr.name: sort()
js_arr.desc: Sorts the elements of an array

js_arr.name: splice()
js_arr.desc: Adds/Removes elements from an array

js_arr.name: toString()
js_arr.desc: Converts an array to a string, and returns the result

js_arr.name: unshift()
js_arr.desc: Adds new elements to the beginning of an array, and returns the new length

js_arr.name: valueOf()
js_arr.desc: Returns the primitive value of an array
